title: Build problem with GDAL on osx

content.raw:
Cross-posted from https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues/8

http://pastebin.com/zJVsjK1h

~~~
/tmp/gazebo-4ney/gazebo/common/Dem.cc:23:11: fatal error: 'gdal/ogr_spatialref.h' file not found
# include <gdal/ogr_spatialref.h>
          ^
1 error generated.
make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/Dem.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
~~~

I've never tested GDAL on osx before. If it's not working, we should consider disabling it on osx to prevent build failures.
